Text:
There's a segment on the special features of "Return of the King" where Christopher Lee, corrected Peter Jackson on how a man sounds when he's stabbed in the back. When Peter Jackson, asked him how he knows, Lee just quickly mentioned his WW2 service and changed the subject.

He stabbed a German! Who are descendents ofï»¿ the Saxons!

He has actually shed the blood of the Saxon man!
